Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: The console that's linked is no longer available and there's no information about which test failed or how. Without logs or reproduce info, it's hard to address.

Action.author: denyeart

11.237s {code} It was seen in parallel with the flake fixed in https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/fabric/+/32595/ : {code:java} --- FAIL: TestQueryCmdEndorsementFailure (0.00s) query_test.go:87: Error Trace: query_test.go:87 Error: An error is expected but got nil. Test: TestQueryCmdEndorsementFailure {code} >

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: The panic in this test was a result of the inconsistent iteration order of the mock endorser clients. As such, this was fixed with https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/commit/8c673d7ecf567f22d9cb29bcf71b65083579d914#diff-4733fcfbe3673b6a2f2884be8b65ae7a.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: Already fixed back in July of 2019.
